biotools.summary: Shiny app for interactive variant prioritisation in precision cancer medicine. Its input file is the output of the Oncotator Variant Annotation tool that summarises variant-centric information from 14 different publicly available resources relevant for cancer researches. Interactive prioritisation in this tool is based on known germline and cancer variants, DNA repair genes and functional prediction scores.
